org.hps.recon.tracking

Class SimpleAmbiguityResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.AmbiguityResolver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.SimpleAmbiguityResolver

  • public class SimpleAmbiguityResolver
extends AmbiguityResolver
    Only performs: removal of duplicates, removal of partials, removal of shared tracks based on number of shared-hits, removal of poor scoring tracks. No consideration of holes, bad channels, acceptance, nor hit times. No track cleaning. Scoring based on chi-squared/dof.
